segments.text: That overflowing sink is disgusting; water everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's soaking the cabinets and pooling on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is stepping in it without a care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Drying a plate while ignoring the flood? Unbelievable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids are climbing for cookies in this mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks filthy from the tilt and all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy's hand deep in the jar, probably getting crumbs everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, adding to the chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This kitchen is turning into a swamp.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand seeing the water damage spread.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden view is nice, but inside it's gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those cookies better not fall into the puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR
